entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kuujjuarapik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:07 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
